title: Canvas
text: New Assignment Posted: Week 5 Discussion. Your instructor has posted a new assignment in SRID.

title: Investment Opportunities
text: üöÄ Make $80,000/month from home with our exclusive trading AI! Join now before spots run out.

title: USPS Delivery Failure
text: We attempted to deliver your package today. Please confirm your address to reschedule.
shortSummary: Delivery phishing email with fake tracking link.

title: Your Bank Statement
text: Your monthly statement is ready. Please log in to review your balance.
shortSummary: Fake bank login page phishing email.

title: CMU Library
text: Your requested book is available for pickup. Show your student ID at the counter.

title: Tax Refund Processing
text: You are eligible for a $15 tax refund. Submit your information within 24 hours.

title: Apartment Viewing Confirmation
text: Your apartment viewing is confirmed for Friday at 3 PM. Please reply if rescheduling is needed.

title: Recruitment Team
text: We found your resume online and think you are a great fit for a remote assistant role. Apply here.
shortSummary: Fake remote job with phishing link.

title: Google Account Security Alert
text: A sign-in attempt was blocked. Review your recent activity if this was not you.

title: Research Collaboration Inquiry
text: I recently read your project summary and would like to explore collaboration opportunities.
shortSummary: Legitimate cold outreach from academic professional.

title: IT Department
text: Your mailbox storage is full. Log in to remediate and prevent message loss.

title: Congratulations!
text: You have been selected to receive a $3,000 academic scholarship. No application required.

title: Amazon Billing Notice
text: Your Amazon account shows a recent purchase of $799. If unauthorized, verify immediately.

title: Professor Williams
text: Please visit my office tomorrow at 10 AM. I would like to discuss your project.

title: Urgent: Your Friend Needs Help
text: Your friend was in an accident. We need immediate assistance. Contact us only via email.

title: Order Receipt
text: Here is the receipt for your recent purchase. Download the attached PDF.

title: Invoice #34721
text: Your invoice for last month is ready. Please confirm payment.

title: PayPal
text: Your PayPal account has been limited. Restore access by verifying your information.

title: Tech Digest Newsletter
text: Welcome to the Daily Tech Digest! Your first summary will arrive tomorrow.

title: HR Onboarding Documents
text: Please download the onboarding forms and complete within 24 hours.
shortSummary: Fake HR attachment used in malware campaigns.

title: Apple Support
text: Your Apple ID has been locked for security reasons. Verify to regain access.

title: Shipping Update
text: Your DHL package is arriving tomorrow. No action needed.

title: Conference Registration
text: Your registration is confirmed. See you at the event!

title: Netflix Billing
text: Your payment was declined. Update your billing details to avoid interruption.

title: Student Financial Aid
text: Your FAFSA documents require minor corrections. Log in through the official portal.

title: Security Alert
text: Unusual outbound traffic detected from your account. Change your password immediately.

title: Amazon Delivery Refund
text: We accidentally charged you twice. Click here to claim your refund.
shortSummary: Refund scam pretending to give money back.

title: Campus Housing
text: Maintenance will enter your room for air filter replacement next week.

title: Journal Review Request
text: Would you be willing to review a manuscript for our journal?

title: DocuSign
text: A document is waiting for your signature. Please review it securely.
